text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Really Nikki?!? Take off your rose colored glasses! People are dying from #coronavirus due to the lack of leadership from Trump! And you’re focused on this crap! It’s time to #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica2020 for #EnoughIsEnough
